name: Get a text overview in Slack with a list of newly tagged contacts in Ontraport
description:
When there are contacts that have been tagged (as a paying customer for example) in Ontraport, you will receive a text overview to Slack.

You can schedule the scenario to run as you need but adjust the filter in the first module accordingly. For example, if it runs once a day, only contacts that have been tagged in the last 24 hours should pass the filter.
